purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of default shape properties.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Shape property assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1032;
items within the scope of application module Value with unit extension, ISO/TS 10303-1753.

aa.refpath: property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation.name = 'default chamfer'} representation.items[i] -> representation_item => {representation_item.name = 'offset value'} measure_representation_item {measure_representation_item <= measure_with_unit > length_measure_with_unit}

property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation.name = 'default draft angle'} representation.items[i] -> representation_item => {representation_item.name = 'draft angle value'} measure_representation_item {measure_representation_item <= measure_with_unit > plane_angle_measure_with_unit}

property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation.name = 'default edge round'} representation.items[i] -> representation_item => {representation_item.name = 'radius value'} measure_representation_item {measure_representation_item <= measure_with_unit > length_measure_with_unit}

property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation.name = 'default fillet'} representation.items[i] -> representation_item => {representation_item.name = 'radius value'} measure_representation_item {measure_representation_item <= measure_with_unit > length_measure_with_unit}

property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation.name = 'default thickness'} representation.items[i] -> representation_item => {representation_item.name = 'thickness value'} measure_representation_item {measure_representation_item <= measure_with_unit > length_measure_with_unit}

property_definition <- property_definition_representation.definition property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation {representation.name = 'default thickness'} representation.items[i] -> representation_item => {representation_item.name = 'parameter name'} descriptive_representation_item descriptive_representation_item.description
